scripts.dev: concurrently -n api,web -c blue,green "npm run dev -w apps/api" "npm run dev -w apps/web"
scripts.build: npm run build -w apps/api && npm run build -w apps/web
scripts.lint: npm run lint -w apps/api && npm run lint -w apps/web
scripts.test: npm run test -w apps/api && npm run test -w apps/web
